```{r}
my_controls <- tableby.control(
  total = F,
  test = F,
  numeric.stats = c("mean"),
  stats.labels = list(
    mean = "Mean",
    var = "Variance"
  )
)

my_labels <- list(
  beer_servings = "Beer servings",
  spirit_servings = "Spirit servings",
  wine_servings = "Wine servings",
  total_litres_of_pure_alcohol = "Total litres of pure alcohol"
)

table_two <- tableby(continent ~ .,
  data = drinks[,2:6],
  control = my_controls
)

summary(table_two,
  labelTranslations = my_labels,
  title = "Summary Statistic of Gapminder Data"
)
```
